sentences.en: Delicious potted shrimps and prawns were once the stock-in-trade of the harbourside cafe.
sentences.cn: 美味的火锅虾曾经是海港周围咖啡馆的招牌菜。

sentences.en: His potted succulents were looking parched.
sentences.cn: 他盆栽的肉质植物看起来已经干枯了。

sentences.en: I put up curtains a tablecloth a potted plant a lamp.
sentences.cn: 窗帘、桌巾、盆栽、台灯,这些小东西都可以创造大效果.

sentences.en: I would give them a potted version of a book I've just finished reading.
sentences.cn: 我会给他们简略地讲一讲我刚读完的一本书。

sentences.en: My mother potted the fish she bought yesterday.
sentences.cn: 母亲把昨日买的鱼装入罐内.

sentences.en: Potted plants should be hardened off before planting out.
sentences.cn: 盆栽植物应经耐寒锻炼才能移植到室外.

sentences.en: Some gardeners say potted roses are easy easier to plant.
sentences.cn: 一些园丁说盆栽玫瑰比较容易种植.

sentences.en: The film is a potted history of the band.
sentences.cn: 影片是该乐队历史的浓缩。

sentences.en: The old man potted the chrysanthemum cuttings.
sentences.cn: 老人把菊花的插枝种在花盆内.

sentences.en: The teacher's desk with a potted plant, since it called'shikonin spent. "
sentences.cn: 老师的办公桌上有一盆花, 给它起名叫 “ 紫草花 ”.

sentences.en: The understocks should be grown in place or should be potted approximately , year prior to grafting.
sentences.cn: 砧木在嫁接前一年左右就应当定植在适当的地方或者盆栽起来.

sentences.en: This potted plant can purify the air, beautify the classroom.
sentences.cn: 这盆花可以净化空气, 美化教室.

words.tran_cn: 盆栽的；罐装的；密封的；喝醉的

trans.tran_cn: 盆栽的，瓶或罐装的，浓缩的，封闭式
